effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

short_effect.black_white: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.black_white: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
